title: DSP Advertiser
description: Adobe Advertising Cloud DSP Advertiser Details.

dsp:advertiserKey.title: Advertiser Key
dsp:advertiserKey.description: Unique external identifier for the advertiser.

dsp:advertiserStatus.title: Advertiser Status
dsp:advertiserStatus.description: Indicates the advertiser's status, whether it is active, inactive or deleted.

dsp:accountId.title: Account Identifier
dsp:accountId.description: The identifier of the account associated with this advertiser.The same accountId can serve multiple advertisers in case it represents an advertising agency.
